item.title: Tidy Tuesday - Coffee Ratings
item.description: As a sort of test post, I thought I’d analyse this week’s Tidy Tuesday data set, which is on coffee ratings. Let’s take a sip. Import the data We can import the data straight from the tidytuesdayR package. library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) # Import the data from the tidy tuesday package coffee_ratings <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2020-07-07')$coffee_ratings ## --- Compiling #TidyTuesday Information for 2020-07-07 ---- ## --- There is 1 file available --- ## --- Starting Download --- ## ## Downloading file 1 of 1: `coffee_ratings.
